00066 StimApp::StimApp(int & argc, char ** argv)
00067     : QApplication(argc, argv, true), debug(false), initializing(true), server(0), nLinesInLog(0), nLinesInLogMax(1000)
00068 {
00069     if (singleton) {
00070         QMessageBox::critical(0, "Invariant Violation", "Only 1 instance of StimApp allowed per application!");
00071         std::exit(1);
00072     }
00073 #ifndef Q_OS_WIN
00074     refresh = 120;
00075 #endif
00076     singleton = this;
00077     if (!::init) ::init = new Init;
00078     loadSettings();
00079 
00080     installEventFilter(this); // filter our own events
00081 
00082     consoleWindow = new ConsoleWindow;
00083     defaultLogColor = consoleWindow->textEdit()->textColor();
00084 
00085     Log() << "Application started";
00086 
00087     glWindow = new GLWindow(800, 600);    
00088     consoleWindow->installEventFilter(this);
00089     consoleWindow->textEdit()->installEventFilter(this);
00090 
00091     glWindow->move(0,0);
00092     
00093     glWindow->show();
00094     getHWFrameCount(); // forces error message to print once if frame count func is not found
00095     consoleWindow->setWindowTitle("StimulateOpenGL II");
00096     consoleWindow->resize(800, 300);
00097     int delta = 0;
00098 #ifdef Q_WS_X11
00099     delta += 22; // this is a rough guesstimate to correct for window frame size being unknown on X11
00100 #endif
00101     consoleWindow->move(0,glWindow->frameSize().height()+delta);
00102     consoleWindow->show();
00103 
00104     setRTPriority();
00105     setVSyncMode();
00106 
00107     glWindow->initPlugins();    
00108 
00109     initServer();
00110 
00111     createAppIcon();
00112 
00113 #ifdef Q_OS_WIN
00114     initializing = false;
00115     Log() << "Application initialized";    
00116 #else
00117     calibrateRefresh();
00118 #endif
00119 
00120     QTimer *timer = new QTimer(this);
00121     Connect(timer, SIGNAL(timeout()), this, SLOT(updateStatusBar()));
00122     timer->setSingleShot(false);
00123     timer->start(247); // update status bar every 247ms.. i like this non-round-numbre.. ;)
00124 }

00126 #ifndef Q_OS_WIN
00127 void StimApp::calibrateRefresh()
00128 {
00129     StimPlugin *p = glWindow->pluginFind("calibplugin"), *r = 0;
00130     if (!p) {
00131         QMessageBox::critical(0,
00132                               "Fatal Error", 
00133                               "Could not find refresh rate calibration plugin",
00134                               QMessageBox::Abort);
00135         std::exit(1);
00136     } else {
00137                       if ((r=glWindow->runningPlugin()) && r != p) {
00138                                  unloadStim();
00139                                  r = glWindow->runningPlugin();
00140                                  if (r && r != p) return; // user must have aborted the operation
00141                       }
00142         Log() << "Calibrating refresh rate...";
00143                       refresh = 120;
00144         p->start(true); // note this plugin ends up calling the calibratedRefresh() slot which then continues with initialization
00145     }
00146 }
00147 
00148 void StimApp::calibratedRefresh(unsigned rate)
00149 {
00150 #if defined(Q_OS_WIN) && !defined(Q_WS_X11)
00151     Log() << "Calibrated refresh: " << rate << "Hz, hardware says: " << (refresh=getHWRefreshRate()) << "Hz";
00152     if (refresh != rate) {
00153         Warning() << "Measured framerate differs from hardware rate.  Possible dropped frames?";
00154     }
00155            refresh = rate;
00156     //refresh = MIN(rate, refresh);
00157     Log() << "Using refresh rate of " << refresh << "Hz";
00158 #else 
00159     refresh = rate;
00160     Log() << "Calibrated refresh: " << refresh << "Hz";
00161 #endif
00162 
00163     if (initializing) {
00164         initializing = false;
00165         Log() << "Application initialized";
00166     }
00167 }
00168 #endif

00190 bool StimApp::eventFilter(QObject *watched, QEvent *event)
00191 {
00192     int type = static_cast<int>(event->type());
00193     if (type == QEvent::KeyPress) {
00194         // globally forward all keypresses to the glwindow
00195         // if they aren't handled, then return false for normal event prop.
00196         QKeyEvent *k = dynamic_cast<QKeyEvent *>(event);
00197         if (k && (watched == consoleWindow || watched == consoleWindow->textEdit())) 
00198             // force events for consoleWindow or textedit to the glwindow
00199             // note that the glWindow will also end up in this function
00200             // but will propagate down to QApplication::eventFilter() at bottom
00201             return sendEvent(glWindow, k);
00202     } 
00203     ConsoleWindow *cw = dynamic_cast<ConsoleWindow *>(watched);
00204     if (cw) {
00205         if (type == LogLineEventType) {
00206             LogLineEvent *evt = dynamic_cast<LogLineEvent *>(event);
00207             if (evt && cw->textEdit()) {
00208                 QTextEdit *te = cw->textEdit();
00209                 QColor origcolor = te->textColor();
00210                 te->setTextColor(evt->color);
00211                 te->append(evt->str);
00212 
00213                 // make sure the log textedit doesn't grow forever
00214                 // so prune old lines when a threshold is hit
00215                 nLinesInLog += evt->str.split("\n").size();
00216                 if (nLinesInLog > nLinesInLogMax) {
00217                     const int n2del = MAX(nLinesInLogMax/10, nLinesInLog-nLinesInLogMax);
00218                     QTextCursor cursor = te->textCursor();
00219                     cursor.movePosition(QTextCursor::Start);
00220                     for (int i = 0; i < n2del; ++i) {
00221                         cursor.movePosition(QTextCursor::Down, QTextCursor::KeepAnchor);
00222                     }
00223                     cursor.removeSelectedText(); // deletes the lines, leaves a blank line
00224                     nLinesInLog -= n2del;
00225                 }
00226 
00227                 te->setTextColor(origcolor);
00228                 te->moveCursor(QTextCursor::End);
00229                 te->ensureCursorVisible();
00230                 return true;
00231             } else {
00232                 return false;
00233             }
00234         } else if (type == StatusMsgEventType) {
00235             StatusMsgEvent *evt = dynamic_cast<StatusMsgEvent *>(event);
00236             if (evt && cw->statusBar()) {
00237                 cw->statusBar()->showMessage(evt->msg, evt->timeout);
00238                 return true;
00239             } else {
00240                 return false;
00241             }
00242         }
00243     }
00244     if (watched == this) {
00245         if (type == QuitEventType) {
00246             quit();
00247             return true;
00248         }
00249     }
00250     // otherwise do default action for event which probably means
00251     // propagate it down
00252     return QApplication::eventFilter(watched, event);
00253 }

00260 void StimApp::initServer()
00261 {
00262     class MyTcpServer : public QTcpServer
00263     {
00264     public:
00265         MyTcpServer(StimApp *parent) : QTcpServer(parent) {}
00266     protected:
00267         void incomingConnection(int sock) {
00268             QThread *thr = new ConnectionThread(sock, this);
00269             Connect(thr, SIGNAL(finished()), thr, SLOT(deleteLater()));
00270             thr->start();
00271             thr->setPriority(QThread::LowPriority);
00272         }
00273     };
00274 
00275     server = new MyTcpServer(this);
00276     static const unsigned short port = 4141;
00277     if (!server->listen(QHostAddress::Any, port)) {
00278         Error() << "Tcp server could not listen on port " << port;
00279         int but = QMessageBox::critical(0, "Network Listen Error", "Tcp server could not listen on port " + QString::number(port) + "\nAnother copy of this program might already be running.\nContinue anyway?", QMessageBox::Abort, QMessageBox::Ignore);
00280         if (but == QMessageBox::Abort) postEvent(this, new QEvent((QEvent::Type)QuitEventType)); // quit doesn't work here because we are in appliation c'tor
00281     } else {
00282         Log() << "Tcp server started, listening for connections on port " << server->serverPort();
00283     }
00284 }

00286 void StimApp::loadSettings()
00287 {
00288     QSettings settings("janelia.hhmi.org", "StimulateOpenGL_II");
00289 
00290     settings.beginGroup("StimApp");
00291     debug = settings.value("debug", true).toBool();
00292     lastFile = settings.value("lastFile", "").toString();
00293     mut.lock();
00294 #ifdef Q_OS_WIN
00295     outDir = settings.value("outDir", "c:/users/code/StimulusLogs").toString();
00296 #else
00297     outDir = settings.value("outDir", QDir::homePath() + "/StimulusLogs").toString();
00298 #endif
00299     mut.unlock();
00300 
00301 }

00303 void StimApp::saveSettings()
00304 {
00305     QSettings settings("janelia.hhmi.org", "StimulateOpenGL_II");
00306 
00307     settings.beginGroup("StimApp");
00308     settings.setValue("debug", debug);
00309     settings.setValue("lastFile", lastFile);
00310     mut.lock();
00311     settings.setValue("outDir", outDir);
00312     mut.unlock();
00313 }

00320         StimApp::instance()->console()->grabKeyboard();

00336 void StimApp::updateStatusBar()
00337 {
00338     StimPlugin *p = 0;
00339     Status sb;
00340     if (glWindow && (p = glWindow->runningPlugin())) {
00341         sb << p->name() << " " << (glWindow->isPaused() ? "paused " : "running ");
00342         sb << " - Frame " << p->getFrameNum();
00343         sb << " - FPS Avg/Min/Max: " << p->getFps() << "/" << p->getFpsMin() << "/" << p->getFpsMax();
00344         if (p->getSBString().length())
00345             sb << " - " << p->getSBString();
00346     } else {
00347         sb << "No plugins running (hit L to load a plugin)";
00348     }
00349 }
00350 
00361 struct ReentrancyPreventer
00362 {
00363     static volatile int ct;
00366     ReentrancyPreventer() { ++ct; }
00369     ~ReentrancyPreventer() {--ct; }
00371     operator bool() const { return ct == 1; }
00372 };
00373 volatile int ReentrancyPreventer::ct = 0;
00374 
00375 void StimApp::loadStim()
00376 {
00377     ReentrancyPreventer rp; if (!rp) return;
00378 
00379     QString lf;
00380     if ( !(lf = QFileDialog::getOpenFileName(0, "Choose a protocol spec to open", lastFile)).isNull() ) { 
00381         lastFile = lf;
00382         saveSettings(); // just to remember the file *now*
00383         QFile f(lastFile);
00384         if (!f.open(QIODevice::ReadOnly|QIODevice::Text)) {
00385             QMessageBox::critical(0, "Could not open", QString("Could not open '") + lastFile + "' for reading.");
00386             return;
00387         }
00388         QTextStream ts(&f);
00389         QString line;
00390         line = ts.readLine().trimmed();
00391         Debug() << "stim plugin: " << line;
00392         StimPlugin *pfound = glWindow->pluginFind(line), *p = glWindow->runningPlugin();
00393         if (!pfound) {
00394             QMessageBox::critical(0, "Plugin not found", QString("Plugin '") + line + "' not found.");
00395             return;
00396         }
00397         if (p && p->getFrameNum() > -1) {
00398             bool doSave = QMessageBox::question(0, "Save data?", QString("Save data for currently-running '") + p->name() + "'?", QMessageBox::Yes, QMessageBox::No) == QMessageBox::Yes;
00399             if (p != glWindow->runningPlugin()) {
00400                 QMessageBox::information(0, "Already unloaded", 
00401                                          "Plugin already unloaded in the meantime!");
00402             } else {
00403                 p->stop(doSave, true);
00404             }
00405         }
00406         p = pfound;
00407 
00408         StimParams params;
00409         QString paramsBuf;  
00410         QTextStream tsparams(&paramsBuf, QIODevice::WriteOnly|QIODevice::Truncate|QIODevice::Text);
00411         // now parse remaining lines which should be name/value pairs
00412         while ( !(line = ts.readLine()).isNull() ) {
00413             tsparams << line << "\n";
00414         }
00415         tsparams.flush();
00416         params.fromString(paramsBuf);
00417         QFileInfo fi(lastFile);
00418         Log() << fi.fileName() << " loaded";
00419         p->setParams(params);
00420         p->start();
00421         glWindow->setWindowTitle(QString("StimulateOpenGL II - ") + fi.fileName());
00422     }
00423 }
00424 
00425 void StimApp::unloadStim()
00426 {
00427     ReentrancyPreventer rp; if (!rp) return;
00428     StimPlugin *p = glWindow->runningPlugin();
00429     if (p) { // if there is a running plugin and it actually ran
00430         int b = QMessageBox::question(0, "Really stop plugin?", QString("Are you sure you wish to stop '") + p->name() + "'?", QMessageBox::Ok, QMessageBox::Cancel);
00431         if (b == QMessageBox::Ok) {
00432             if (p != glWindow->runningPlugin())
00433                 QMessageBox::information(0, "Already unloaded", 
00434                                          "Plugin already unloaded in the meantime!");
00435             else if (p->getFrameNum() > -1) {
00436                 bool doSave = QMessageBox::question(0, "Save data?", QString("Save data for '") + p->name() + "'?", QMessageBox::Yes, QMessageBox::No) == QMessageBox::Yes;
00437                 if (p != glWindow->runningPlugin()) {
00438                     QMessageBox::information(0, "Already unloaded", 
00439                                              "Plugin already unloaded in the meantime!");
00440                 } else
00441                     p->stop(doSave, true);
00442                 
00443             }
00444         }
00445     }
00446 }

00458 bool StimApp::setOutputDirectory(const QString & dpath)
00459 {
00460     QDir d(dpath);
00461     if (!d.exists()) return false;
00462     mut.lock();
00463     outDir = dpath;
00464     mut.unlock();
00465     return true;
00466 }

00468 void StimApp::pickOutputDir()
00469 {
00470     ReentrancyPreventer rp; if (!rp) return;
00471     mut.lock();
00472     QString od = outDir;
00473     mut.unlock();
00474     if ( !(od = QFileDialog::getExistingDirectory(0, "Choose a directory to which to save output files", od, QFileDialog::DontResolveSymlinks|QFileDialog::ShowDirsOnly)).isNull() ) { 
00475         mut.lock();
00476         outDir = od;
00477         mut.unlock();
00478         saveSettings(); // just to remember the file *now*
00479     }
00480 }

00482 void StimApp::createAppIcon()
00483 {
00484     QPixmap pm(QSize(128, 128));
00485     pm.fill(Qt::transparent);
00486     QRadialGradient gradient(50, 50, 50, 50, 50);
00487     gradient.setColorAt(0, QColor::fromRgbF(1, 0, 0, 1));
00488     gradient.setColorAt(1, QColor::fromRgbF(0, 0, 0, 0));
00489     QPainter painter(&pm);
00490     painter.fillRect(0, 0, 128, 128, gradient);
00491     painter.end();
00492     consoleWindow->setWindowIcon(QIcon(pm));
00493     
00494     pm.fill(Qt::transparent);
00495     painter.begin(&pm);
00496     
00497     gradient.setColorAt(0, QColor::fromRgbF(0, 0, 1, 1));
00498     gradient.setColorAt(1, QColor::fromRgbF(0, 0, 0, 0));
00499 
00500     painter.fillRect(0, 0, 128, 128, gradient);
00501 
00502     glWindow->setWindowIcon(QIcon(pm));
00503 }

00510 void StimApp::hideUnhideConsole()
00511 {
00512     if (consoleWindow) {
00513         if (consoleWindow->isHidden()) consoleWindow->show();
00514         else {
00515             bool hadfocus = ( focusWidget() == consoleWindow );
00516             consoleWindow->hide();
00517             if (glWindow && hadfocus) glWindow->setFocus(Qt::OtherFocusReason);
00518         }
00519     }
00520 }

00522 void StimApp::alignGLWindow()
00523 {
00524     if (glWindow) {
00525         if (!savedGeometry.isEmpty()) {
00526             glWindow->restoreGeometry(savedGeometry);
00527             savedGeometry.clear();
00528             Log() << "Restored GL window to original position";
00529         } else {
00530             QDesktopWidget desktop;
00531             const QRect screenRect(desktop.screenGeometry(glWindow));
00532             int xdelta = glWindow->geometry().x() - glWindow->x(),
00533                 ydelta = glWindow->geometry().y() - glWindow->y();
00534             if (xdelta <= 0 || ydelta <= 0) {
00535                 Error() << "Cannot align GLWindow since something is wrong with the window system's idea of the frame geometry!";
00536                 return;
00537             }
00538             savedGeometry = glWindow->saveGeometry();
00539             glWindow->move(screenRect.x()-xdelta, screenRect.y()-ydelta);
00540             Log() << "Aligned GL window to monitor 0,0";
00541         }
00542     }
00543 }
